headline: Edison International (EIX): Among the Best Utility Stocks to Buy According to Analysts
summary: We recently published a list of 13 Best Utility Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Edison International (NYSE:EIX) stands against other best utility stocks to buy according to analysts. Utility stocks represent companies primarily engaged in providing electricity, natural gas, and water distribution […]
